GeochemXYDiagram.name: Anorthite Control Diagram (Zr)
GeochemXYDiagram.Comment: Pearce Element Ratio diagram used to describe anorthite fractionation and/or sorting. Zr used as denominator.
A slope of 1 from the origin controls fractionation and/or sorting of anorthite.
GeochemXYDiagram.Reference: Theoretical basis for PER diagrams is described in Stanley C. R., and Madeisky H. E., 1996 Lithogeochemical Exploration for Metasomatic Zones Associated with Hydrothermal Mineral Deposits Using Pearce Element Ratio Analysis
